      Subclasses of MeanModel in de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.model 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EMModel
      Cluster model of an EM cluster, providing a mean and a full covariance Matrix.
      class  GeneratorModel
      Cluster model for synthetically generated data.
      class  KMeansModel
      Trivial subclass of the MeanModel that indicates the clustering to be produced by k-means (so the Voronoi cell visualization is sensible).
      class  SubspaceModel
      Model for Subspace Clusters.
